mapper.select: select c.users_number from tbl_care_users c, tbl_users u where c.users_number = u.users_number and u.USERs_id = #{userId} and u.users_password = #{userPassword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_care_member (care_number, users_name, users_email, users_phone, users_postsal_code, users_address_line1, users_address_line2, care_intro_text, care_certificate_files_num, care_passbook_files_num, care_profiles_photo_number, care_accept, users_number) VALUES (seq_care_member.nextval, #{usersName}, #{usersEmail}, #{usersPhone}, #{usersPostsalCode}, #{usersAddressLine1}, #{usersAddressLine2}, #{careIntroText}, #{careCertificateFilesNum}, #{carePassbookFilesNum}, #{careProfilesPhotoNumber}, #{careAccept}, #{usersNumber})
